hands: The main worker (right) is holding and operating a circular saw with both hands. The other worker (left) has their hands at their sides or on their tool belt, observing.
materials: Wood frame walls (background, left and right)

items: Trip hazards (loose lumber pieces on floor)
Proximity to power tools (circular saw in operation)
Missing PPE (no hard hats visible on either worker, no safety glasses visible on either worker, especially the one operating the saw)
hazards.details: Loose lumber on the floor presents trip hazards. A circular saw is in active use, posing a cutting hazard. Neither worker appears to be wearing a hard hat or safety glasses, which are crucial PPE for this type of work.

reasoning: The main worker is actively operating a circular saw to cut lumber, indicating a productive cutting activity. The other worker is observing, likely part of the team's workflow.
